name: Caving In
description:
You find yourself trapped in a collapsing cave! You are quickly running out of space to breathe, you need to climb quick! Climb as much as you can before the water inevitably floods the whole cave.

CONTROLS
 - AD to move left and right
 - SPACE to jump (you can press it twice to double jump)

TIPS
 - Can't find a way up? Use the falling boulders to reach that next platform!
 - Although your goal is to avoid the water, you can also use it to your advantage because of the reduced gravity!
 - There is a leaderboard, so compete to be at the very top!
